titleStmt.title: The example As it vvas presented by her Majesties Servants at the private house in Drury-Lane. Written by Iames Shirly.
titleStmt.author: Shirley, James, 1596-1666.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Norton, for Andrew Crooke, and William Cooke,
